reviewText: I enjoyed this movie when I first saw it on LMN, I thought I would buy it so I could share it with my husband on Thursday night which is movie night.

This DVD has never been available officially in the US but was released on DVD in Canada as the movie was a Canadian production.  The DVD offers a crisp fullscreen transfer, english and french audio and it ends there...  While barebones, it is the only region 1 version out there and is a great addition for any "Shannen Doherty" collection.
